Text: Production of Electronic Documents in Merger with DynegyDear Mr Derrick I am Director of Marketing and Sales of Mobious Solutions a company that specializes in the discovery and production of electronic evidence Kindly permit Mobious to perform a demonstration for you of a fully automated process by which to separate and produce responsive nonresponsive and privileged electronic documents with special emphasis on emailin the event of a nd Request production of documents mandated by the federal government in Enrons merger with Dynegy Mobious method is enormously expeditious and has saved corporate entities thousands hundreds of thousands and even millions of dollars Sincerely Bob Eisenberg Email mailweb Check your email from the web at
